attributes.action: stop councils going to fortnightly refuse collections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think this should be because most council's recycling rates are increasing every year for example my local council which is Blaby District's rate has increased every year since 2003
since they have increase the vareity of materials thye collect from the kerbside ,which is as follows cans,tins,plastic bottles and aslo glass bottles and jars.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
